parameters.content:
# Disparador de Campanha para ChatWoot [SAAS]
## Evolution API V2


v 2.2
https://github.com/rodtanci/Disparador-de-Campanha-Chatwoot-Evolution

## Resolve Conversa

parameters.subject: Limite de disparo excedido
Relat√≥rio a Campanha

parameters.query:
SELECT 
    c.falhou, 
    c.enviou, 
    a.limite_disparo 
FROM 
    campaigns c
JOIN 
    accounts a ON c.account_id = a.id
WHERE 
    c.id = {{ $node['Campanha'].json.id.campanha }};

parameters.subject: Relat√≥rio a Campanha

parameters.query:
SELECT 
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM campaigns_failled WHERE id_campanha = {{ $node['Campanha'].json.id.campanha }}) AS total_registros,
    campaigns_failled.*
FROM campaigns_failled
WHERE id_campanha = {{ $node['Campanha'].json.id.campanha }};

parameters.subject: Limite de disparo excedido

parameters.query:
SELECT 
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM campaigns_failled WHERE id_campanha = {{ $node['Dados da campanha'].json.id_campanha }}) AS total_registros,
    cf.*
FROM campaigns_failled cf
WHERE cf.id_campanha = {{ $node['Dados da campanha'].json.id_campanha }};

SELECT 
    c.falhou, 
    c.enviou, 
    a.limite_disparo 
FROM 
    campaigns c
JOIN 
    accounts a ON c.account_id = a.id
WHERE 
    c.id = {{ $node['Campanha'].json.id.campanha }};
UPDATE campaigns SET status_envia = 1 WHERE id = {{ $json.id }}

parameters.query: select * from campaigns c  where campaign_type = 1  and status_envia = 0 and account_id = 1
select * from inboxes i  where id = {{ $json.inbox_id }}

parameters.jsonBody:
={
    "enabled": true,
    "url": "{{ $('Info_Base').item.json.typebotapi_url }}",
    "typebot": "{{ $('Campanha').item.json.typebot }}",
    "triggerType": "none",
    "triggerOperator": "regex",
    "triggerValue": "^atend.*",
    "expire": 20,
    "keywordFinish": "#SAIR",
    "delayMessage": 1000,
    "unknownMessage": "Mensagem n√£o reconhecida",
    "listeningFromMe": false,
    "stopBotFromMe": false,
    "keepOpen": false,
    "debounceTime": 10
}

parameters.query: select * from labels i  where id = {{ JSON.parse($('Campanha').item.json.etiqueta) }};
